ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:09:06 [Issue ID 4000-226627] urn:comicvine:4000-226627 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:37:25. [Issue ID 241832]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Grateful Kitten: A cat tells his kittens about how Mighty Mouse saved him, when he was a kitten.
Fatty's Folly: Young Fatty proves to his pop that even a slow, fat cat can catch mice, if he uses brains. All goes according to plan, until Mighty Mouse shows up.
The Reluctant Rescue: Mighty Mouse must continually rescue a young rabbit with no common sense.
Harry's Thinking Cap: Oil Can Harry invents a “thinking cap” that gives him the brain power to devise the means to spirit Pearl Pureheart off to the planet Jupiter.
Dimwit Cleans Up: Heckle and Jeckle decline Dimwit's offer of more stew - but get it anyway.
Sourpuss Has Some “Rushing Blood” in Him: Gandy inadvertently insults Sourpuss.
Rudy Takes First Prize: Rudy takes first prize in the barnyard bridge game, but not in the conventional sense.
Tit For Tat: Percy has Little Roquefort tied and staked to the ground, and bombs him with tomatoes. Until one tomato flies errantly…
Well Charged: A fox forces Dinky to steal eggs for him.
"K.O." Sourpuss: Sourpuss trains to become a boxer, but is quickly dissuaded.
Hawaii Bound: Rudy brags to Dinky about going to Hawaii, but his actions inadvertently get Dinky there first.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jeckle,Chesty,Gandy Goose,Oil Can Harry,Dimwit,Dinky Duck,Mighty Mouse,Heckle,Pearl Pureheart,Sourpuss,Little Roquefort,Percy Puss,Rudy the Rooster
